        var _vwo_code=(function(){
        var account_id=321469,
        settings_tolerance=2000,
        library_tolerance=2500,
        use_existing_jquery=false,
        /* DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE */
        f=false,d=document;return{use_existing_jquery:function(){return use_existing_jquery;},library_tolerance:function(){return library_tolerance;},finish:function(){if(!f){f=true;var a=d.getElementById('_vis_opt_path_hides');if(a)a.parentNode.removeChild(a);}},finished:function(){return f;},load:function(a){var b=d.createElement('script');b.src=a;b.type='text/javascript';b.innerText;b.onerror=function(){_vwo_code.finish();};d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(b);},init:function(){settings_timer=setTimeout('_vwo_code.finish()',settings_tolerance);var a=d.createElement('style'),b='body{opacity:0 !important;filter:alpha(opacity=0) !important;background:none !important;}',h=d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];a.setAttribute('id','_vis_opt_path_hides');a.setAttribute('type','text/css');if(a.styleSheet)a.styleSheet.cssText=b;else a.appendChild(d.createTextNode(b));h.appendChild(a);this.load('//dev.visualwebsiteoptimizer.com/j.php?a='+account_id+'&u='+encodeURIComponent(d.URL)+'&r='+Math.random());return settings_timer;}};}());_vwo_settings_timer=_vwo_code.init();
        

        (function() {
        window.__insp = window.__insp || [];
        __insp.push(['wid', 446183283]);
        var ldinsp = function(){ if(typeof window.__inspld != "undefined") return; window.__inspld = 1; var insp = document.createElement('script'); insp.type = 'text/javascript'; insp.async = true; insp.id = "inspsync"; insp.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ?         })();

                        $(document).ready(function(){
                            var divs = $("#testimonials .inner .homereview").get().sort(function(){
                                return Math.round(Math.random())-0.5; //random so we get the right +/- combo
                            }).slice(0,3)
                            $(divs).prependTo(divs[0].parentNode).show();                   
                        });
                    

        (function(t,e,a,l,i,u,m){
            if(t.utag)return;e=t.utag={};e.e=[];
            e.view=function(a,b,c){e.e.push({a:a,b:b,c:c,d:"view"})};
            e.link=function(a,b,c){e.e.push({a:a,b:b,c:c,d:"link"})};
            e.track=function(a){e.e.push({a:a.data,b:(a.cfg?a.cfg.cb:null),c:(a.cfg?a.cfg.uids:undefined),d:a.event})};
        }(window));
        

              
    var strTrackTealium_ServiceCode = "";
    
    function serviceCodeInformation() {   
        // Grabs all the cookies set and splits them into an array, searches for the pricing strategy cookie and returns just the value
        var strTrackTealium_CookieName = "PSDisplayed"
        var strTrackTealium_PSQueryString = ""
        var arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode = "";
        
        var arrTrackTealium_Cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
        for(var i = 0; i < arrTrackTealium_Cookies.length; i++) {
            var strCookie = arrTrackTealium_Cookies[i];
            while (strCookie.charAt(0) == ' ') {
                strCookie = strCookie.substring(1, strCookie.length);
            }
            if (strCookie.indexOf(strTrackTealium_CookieName) == 0) {
                arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode = strCookie.substring(strTrackTealium_CookieName.length + 1, strCookie.length);
                arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode = arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode.replace("%2C", ",");
            }
        }
        //The cookie isn't always set by the time this code runs so we had to do a check to see if the value was added to cookie otherwise add it to our variable
        if (arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode.indexOf(strTrackTealium_PSQueryString.toUpperCase()) == -1) {
            arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode = arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode + "," + strTrackTealium_PSQueryString.toUpperCase();
        } 
        
        //Split the array variable to actually be an array and then build the service code string
        arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode = arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode.split(",");
        
        for(var i = 0; i < arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode.length; i++) {
            if (strTrackTealium_ServiceCode == "") {
                strTrackTealium_ServiceCode = '"' + arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode[i] + '"';
            }
            else {
                strTrackTealium_ServiceCode += ", " + '"' + arrTrackTealium_ServiceCode[i] + '"';
            }
        }
        
    }
    
    function lfTrackTealium_CreateProductSkuProductId(ProductSku, ProductId){

        var arrProductSku   = ProductSku.split(",");
        var arrProductId    = ProductId.split(",");
        var productSku_productId = ""; 
       
        for(var i = 0; i < arrProductSku.length; i++){  
            productSku_productId += '"' + arrProductSku[i].replace(/"/g,"").trim() + "-" + arrProductId[i].replace(/"/g,"").trim() + '"'; 
            
            if(i !== arrProductSku.length - 1){
               productSku_productId += ", " ;
            }     
        }
        return productSku_productId;
    }
    
            serviceCodeInformation();
        
    var utag_data = {
		"locale"	: "en_us",
        "cart_total_items"          : "0",
        "country_code"              : "Not logged in",
        "customer_city"             : "Not logged in",
        "customer_country"          : "Not logged in",
        "customer_email"            : "Not logged in",
        "customer_first_name"       : "Not logged in",
        "customer_last_name"        : "Not logged in",
        "customer_postal_code"      : "Not logged in",
        "customer_state"            : "Not logged in",
        "page_name"                 : "Home",
        "page_type"                 : "homepage",
        "service_code"              : [strTrackTealium_ServiceCode],
        "shopper_id"                : "Not logged in",
        "shopper_referral_source"   : "None",
        "shopper_x_order_count"     : "0x",
        "site_section"              : "Home"
    };

        

        //Tealium Tag
        (function(a,b,c,d){
            a='//tags.tiqcdn.com/utag/lens/lens-desktop/prod/utag.js';
            b=document;c='script';d=b.createElement(c);d.src=a;
            d.type='text/java'+c;d.async=true;
            a=b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0];a.parentNode.insertBefore(d,a);  
        })();
        

        function lfTrackTealium_CallEventOnload() {
             
        }
        
        lfTrackTealium_CallEventOnload();
        
        (function(w){
        if(typeof w.utag !== 'undefined' && typeof w.utag.e === 'object'){
            w.utag_events = w.utag.e;
            delete w.utag;
        }
        }(window))
        
        deferUntil('window.utag', false, function() {
            (function(w){
                if((typeof w.utag_events === 'object' && w.utag_events.length > 0)){
                    while(w.utag_events.length){
                    d=w.utag_events.shift();
                    (function(d){
                        setTimeout(function(){
                            utag.track({
                                event: d.d,
                                data: d.a,
                                cfg: {
                                    cb: d.b,
                                    uids: d.c
                                }
                            });
                        }, 150);
                    })(d);
                    }
                }
            }(window))
        }, "object");
